problem_info.title: 3304. Find the K-th Character in String Game I
test_examples: Example 1: Input: k = 5 Output:  b  Explanation: Initially, word =  a . We need to do the operation three times: Generated string is  b , word becomes  ab . Generated string is  bc , word becomes  abbc . Generated string is  bccd , word becomes  abbcbccd .
